project: DotCommand v1.5.0 ‚Äî Intelligence Foundation & Command Expansion
description: Analytics engine, ML-based suggestions, custom context rules, data-driven command architecture, and full command category expansion.

tasks.title: Analytics Service
tasks.description: Track suggestion clicks, acceptance rates, and response times in local storage

tasks.title: Package.json Auto-Suggestions
tasks.description: Parse package.json and suggest existing dependencies when installing new packages

tasks.title: Custom Context Rules (JSON)
tasks.description: Users can define custom context triggers for personal templates via JSON config

tasks.title: Performance Monitoring
tasks.description: Monitor cache hit rate, suggestion relevance scores, and execution times

tasks.title: ML-Based Suggestions
tasks.description: Weighted scoring using usage frequency, recency, context match, and category preference

tasks.title: Session Tracking
tasks.description: Track session ID, duration, and session events for user activity analysis

tasks.title: Command Success Rate Tracking
tasks.description: Monitor command reliability with success/failure tracking per command

tasks.title: Context Detection Accuracy
tasks.description: Measure and learn from how often detected context is correct via user corrections

tasks.title: Analytics Test Suite
tasks.description: Full test suite for analytics service covering event tracking, session, and success rates

tasks.title: ML Suggestions Test Suite
tasks.description: Test suite for ML-based suggestion engine covering scoring, ranking, and context matching

tasks.title: PackageJson Parser Test Suite
tasks.description: 37-test suite covering: package manager detection priority (pnpm>yarn>bun>npm), smart companion-package suggestions (react‚Üíreact-dom/@types/react, eslint‚Üíprettier, jest‚Üí@types/jest, typescript‚Üí@types/node, axios‚Üí@types/axios), dependency lookup (hasPackage/getPackageType), script extraction, relevance-sorted search (exact>starts-with>alphabetical), singleton pattern, and cache invalidation. Integrated as VS Code command: dotcommand.runPackageJsonTests

tasks.title: Extended Context File Detection (commandTemplates.ts)
tasks.description: Updated ContextDetector in commandTemplates.ts to recognize 10+ new project types. isImportantFile() now covers Flutter/Dart (pubspec.yaml), Gradle (build.gradle, build.gradle.kts, settings.gradle), Maven (pom.xml), CMake (CMakeLists.txt), Make (Makefile), Terraform (.tf extension), pnpm (pnpm-lock.yaml), Python extras (setup.py, Pipfile), Docker yaml variant, .NET (.sln). detectTechnologies() now returns 14 new technologies: flutter, dart, gradle, maven, cmake, cpp, make, terraform, csharp, pnpm, yarn, nextjs, nuxtjs, svelte, electron. Added [...new Set()] deduplication.

tasks.title: Command Chaining (via Template System)
tasks.description: Command chaining is fully supported through the existing template system. Users create templates with '&&' chains in the command field (e.g., 'npm install && npm run build && git push origin {branch}'). This uses a single terminal.sendText() call ‚Äî the shell handles sequencing and stops on failure. No timing issues. Template variables handle dynamic parts. No additional code required.
tasks.approach: Shell && operator via template system ‚Äî zero timing issues, correct failure propagation

tasks.title: VS Code Extension Commands Category
tasks.description: Full vsce/ovsx command set: package, publish (patch/minor/major/pre-release), login, logout, local install, Open VSX publish

tasks.title: Data-Driven Prepared Commands (JSON)
tasks.description: Refactored prepared commands from 500+ lines of hardcoded TypeScript to a clean JSON data file. Adding commands now requires only a JSON edit.
tasks.impact: prepared.ts reduced from 500+ lines to ~90 lines of loader logic

tasks.title: 8 New Command Categories
tasks.description: Added Rust (cargo), Go, pnpm, Terraform, AWS CLI, Flutter/Dart, Gradle & Maven, SSH & Remote ‚Äî totalling 20 categories with 180+ prepared commands
categories_added: SSH & Remote Commands (ssh/scp/rsync/ssh-keygen with dynamic parameters)

tasks.title: Smart Terminal Routing
tasks.description: Updated terminal manager with priority-ordered category routing. Rust before Go (cargo contains 'go'), Database before Go (mongo contains 'go'), SSH before Linux.

tasks.title: Command Category Detection
tasks.description: Updated detection.ts with Flutter, Gradle/Maven, SSH/Remote pattern matching before Linux fallback

tasks.title: Full Icon & Emoji Coverage (20 Categories)
tasks.description: Updated treeView.ts with icons and emojis for all 20 categories across both Prepared Commands panel and My Commands tree. Added getCommandIcon detection for cargo, go, flutter, gradlew, mvn, ssh, scp, rsync.

tasks_added_post_release: command_chaining       ‚Äî Confirmed working via template system (&&)

deferred_to_v2.description: Advanced Analytics Dashboard Webview with charts
deferred_to_v2.reason: Requires v1.5.0 collected data as source
JSON config available in v1.5.0, visual UI in v2.0.0

deferred_to_v2.description: Enhanced Responsive Design for all screen sizes
